wikipedia_page.main: Ida Margaret Gaskin  (née Jacobs, 12 December 1919 – 8 January 2016) was a Welsh-born New Zealand schoolteacher and politician, known for her expert knowledge of Shakespeare, and for becoming the first woman in New Zealand to win the local version of Mastermind.

response: * Ida Gaskin (1919–2016), Labour Party candidate for New Plymouth, Mastermind winner

*8 January – Ida Gaskin, 96, teacher and quiz show contestant.
